ellipsis.translation[0].definitions[0].d: when words are deliberately left out of a sentence, though the meaning can still be understood. For example, you may say ‘He’s leaving but I’m not’ instead of saying ‘He’s leaving but I’m not leaving’.
ellipsis.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the sign (...) used in writing to show that some words have deliberately been left out of a sentence
